reviews.review: Esse jogo é o pai da Source Engine. Compra isso e ganha dois jogos - HL2 Deathmatch e HL2 Death Coast (E possívelmente os dois episodes porque eu comprei a orange box)
if your'e looking for a good story and gameplay then this is it it's worth 20 bucks but they sell it at ten bucks this is a good game and i recommend it

游戏整体的[b]节奏[/b]把握得很[b]好[/b]，在[b]形式[/b]上能做到[b]一致[/b]，巴尼、阿历克斯的[b]人物形象[/b]被塑造得[b]饱满[/b]。
每份地图都设计有独特的氛围，尤其是莱温霍姆。从我在黑山基地与阿历克斯重逢到我一人抵达莱温霍姆的这段时间，内心感受从欢喜到悲伤。也许是因为玩家在莱温霍姆时的孤独感，神父的作用更加突显。（可以说，神父是我在莱温霍姆时的灯塔。）

[i] 运河航道尽头，苦难的弗地冈人，战争时期的避难者。一堆火，难道是来自未来的光点，那儿没有战争，没有对立，也许碰一下就能美梦成真，弗地冈人看着手头上最后的几只猎头蟹。 [/i]

一部带有科幻元素且讲述战争的游戏，除了冷酷，还有温情。我给出[b] 满分评价 [/b]。
One of my all time favorite game series!!
这游戏很不错推荐游玩

Half-Life 2 is a stunning game even in 2020. 
a must have for any self respecting PC Gamer

1. bind mwheelup "+jump"
2. bind mwheeldown "+jump"
3. start sprinting 
4. start scrolling down repeatedly to match the exact time you hit the ground
5. so a 180 and continue scrolling while A and D airstrafing alternating every second
6. hold crouch for best results

now you know how to do an accelerated backhop

Amazing. I love the physics, storytelling, and low system requirements. However the teammate AI is pretty bad. Also, the base game has pretty bad replayability (This is fixed by mods), unless you like seeing things ragdoll over and over again with no goal after the first playthrough. However, despite these things, it is totally worth it.
fun run and gun. old school

Half-Life 2 ist ein Zeitloses Spiel, macht 2020 auch noch Spaß. Die Source Engine die auch in Counter Strike Source verwendet wird läuft seit Jahren Problemlos. Und sorgt für gute Grafik im Level Design.

Half-Life 2 is the type of game that, after I play through it, it's all I can think about.
It led me through 18 hours of an exciting story with both characters I've grown to love and to hate.
I'm honestly not an FPS fan, but this game is a true exception to that rule; combat is exhilarating, smooth, and perfectly nerve-wracking at times.
This game is a blessing on our world and I cannot recommend it more.

Stará dobrá klasika aj dnes si ju rád zahrám a vrelo odporúčam. 16.novembra 2020 bude oslavovať 16 rokov od vydania, objektívne tým pádom nemôže dosahovať grafickú kvalitu dnešných hier, kedže už aj HW je niekde úplne inde ako vtedy ale na hrateľnosti jej to vôbec neuberá (subjektívne sa mi páči aj po grafickej stránke). Dynamická hudba, interakcia s postavami v hre a iné veci ma očarili už vtedy páči sa mi to dodnes. A Gravity gun je proste božia :)

Great story that I’m interested in, exciting combat and fun weapons. I had a good time but not a great time. Maybe it was the hype but Half-Life 2 is pretty much what I expected. Everyone should definitely play it but for me it’s not necessary a genre I am passionate about. 

3.5/5
it's like some cod ripoff or something, still pretty cool tho.

It's definitely a great game if you like story, but on repeated playthroughs, it can get pretty boring at times. When this game came out everything in it was revolutionary, but I don't think it's better than Half-Life 1. In my opinion, Half-Life 1 is just amazing and the gameplay was amazing. I don't really like half-life 2 that much. please don't smite me down, but I think gameplay is more important than story. Half Life 2 is still good, but Half-Life 1 aged a lot better than Half-Life 2. You can still play the game and have fun but if it starts feeling bored, it's probably because a lot of shooters do exactly what Half-Life 2 did. Now I'm going to go dig a grave for when the Fan Base kills me for that opinion.

First time Player and i have been playing through the series. Eventhough i prefer Half life 1 over this, Half life 2 was masterful. Not a even a moment where the game was lagging behind. Everyone has prasied it and i see why.

This is one of the games that everybody should play at least once. An original universe, compelling character development, no cutscenes and other "mandatory" content, and a fantastic story. This is the reason why people still want a Half Life 3. And if you dislike the outdated graphics, you can always use the cinematic mod.

O jogo não é difícil, não achei enjoativo e eu achei legal. O problema é que ele veio com um erro nas legendas. Então para habilitá-las você precisa ir em opções, teclado e em baixo clicar em avançado e habilitar o "ativar console de desenvolvedor". Voltar para o menu e clicar a tecla das aspas: ''. Que vai abrir o console, e para habilitar as legendas em inglês por exemplo, deve digitar: cc_lang english.Para usar a legenda em português br traduzida corretamente é só pesquisar no youtube.
